overview: Join Falcon Exclusive Dean Monroe and eight hot studs in the most explosive all-male orgy of the year. No plot, no dialogue, just a marathon of raunchy man sex. With Chi Chi LaRue on the director's chair, you know the sex is going to be nasty and non-stop. And with Dean teaming up with certified sex pig Falcon Favorite Tag Adams to take on a stable of seven insatiable studs, you know the action is going to leave you breathless.
title: Bang Bang!
